snippet: Bob Fu, a Chinese-born pastor who started the dissident group ChinaAid, was instrumental in calling attention to the plight of the activist Chen Guangcheng.
abstract: Bob Fu, a Chinese-born pastor who started the dissident group ChinaAid, was instrumental in calling attention to the plight of the activist Chen Guangcheng; Fu is coordinating a growing movement among American Christians to work for religious freedom in China.

byline.contributor: Shi Da contributed research from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: Bob Fu, a Chinese-born pastor who started the dissident group ChinaAid, was instrumental in calling attention to the plight of the activist Chen Guangcheng.

headline.seo: Echoing Out of Texas, a Voice of China Freedom
headline.main: Echoing Out of Texas, Chinese Voice of Dissent for Religious Freedom
headline.print_headline: Echoing Out of Texas, Chinese Voice of Dissent

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
